title: Mid laner looking for an active and competitive flex team
body: Im a mid laner, and if you need one for a flex team, I can join. I haven't played flex much in the past, but I always carry in solo duo, and I have great mechanics and game knowledge. I feel that adding in flex mechanics wouldnt be too hard. my ign is SaxophoneGod12, and im currently a bronze 1 smurf. I have been up to silver 2 but I gave that account away to a friend. Again, if you need a mid laner, hit me up.
